name: test_post_body_negative[connection_POST_negative_Invalid field types and values]
description:
Negative cases of request body testing
    Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
    nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.
descriptionHtml:
Negative cases of request body testing
Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.

testStage.description:
Negative cases of request body testing
    Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
    nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.

steps.name: Assert - All fields without body checks - Special values: filesystem_id, cluster_id, name
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Assert - filesystem_id: ['The selected filesystem id is invalid.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Assert - cluster_id: ['The selected cluster id is invalid.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Assert - name: ['The name may not be greater than 255 characters.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>

parameters.name: expected_body
parameters.value: {'name': ['The name may not be greater than 255 characters.']}
